text: Appal, avarkal tam utanpatikkaiyai murittu vittatal nam avarkalaic capittom;. Avarkalutaiya irutayankalai irukac ceytom;. (Irai)vacanankalai atarkuriya (cariyana) itankaliliruntu avarkal marrukirarkal. Avarkalukku valankappattirunta potanaiyin (perum) pakutiyai marantu vittarkal;. Akave avarkalil cilarait tavira avarkalil perumpalorin mocatiyaip parri (napiye!) Nir tavaramal kantu konte iruppir. Enave nir avarkalai mannattup purakkanittu vituviraka. Meyyakave nanmai ceyvorai allah necikkiran
